hero.subtitle: Serving all of South Florida
hero.newsContent: Door Lock Monitoring Code Compliance Before August 1st, 2025

about.title: About Us
about.description: Elevator Tech Solutions is a licensed, insured, and certified elevator contractor specializing in installation, repairs, and maintenance of commercial and residential elevators. With over 20 years of experience, our team of certified technicians provides exceptional service throughout South Florida. We prioritize safety, reliability, and customer satisfaction in all our projects.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.quote1: Elevator Tech Solutions has been maintaining our building's elevators for the past three years, and we couldn't be happier with their service. They're always prompt, professional, and thorough.
testimonials.quote2: After struggling with unreliable elevator service for years, we switched to Elevator Tech Solutions and haven't had any issues since. Their team is knowledgeable and responsive.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Elevator Experts
about.description: With years of experience in the elevator industry, we provide top-quality services for installation, maintenance, and repair of all types of elevators. Our team of certified technicians is committed to ensuring the safety and reliability of your elevator systems.
about.historyText: Founded in 2010, Elevator Tech Solutions has grown from a small maintenance company to a full-service elevator solution provider throughout South Florida. With over 15 years of industry experience, we've built our reputation on reliability, expertise, and customer satisfaction.
about.missionText: Our mission is to provide safe, efficient, and reliable elevator solutions that exceed industry standards while delivering exceptional service to our clients.
about.teamText: Our team consists of certified technicians, experienced engineers, and dedicated support staff who work together to ensure every project is completed to the highest standards.

valuesList.title: Safety
valuesList.description: Safety is our top priority in every project we undertake.

valuesList.title: Quality
valuesList.description: We use only the finest materials and cutting-edge technology.

valuesList.title: Reliability
valuesList.description: Our team is committed to being there when you need us.

valuesList.title: Innovation
valuesList.description: We continuously research and implement the latest advancements.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Professional Elevator Solutions
services.intro: We offer a comprehensive range of elevator services to meet all your needs:

installation.title: Installation
installation.description: Professional installation of new elevator systems for residential and commercial buildings.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.description: Regular maintenance services to ensure your elevators operate safely and efficiently.

repair.title: Repair
repair.description: Fast and reliable repair services for all elevator makes and models.

modernization.title: Modernization
modernization.description: Upgrade your existing elevator systems with the latest technology and safety features.

inspection.title: Inspection
inspection.description: Thorough safety inspections to ensure compliance with all regulations.

services.cta: Contact us today for a free consultation

brands.title: Our Trusted Brands
brands.subtitle: We work with the industry's leading manufacturers
brands.description: At Elevator Tech Solutions, we partner with the world's leading elevator manufacturers to provide you with reliable, high-quality, and innovative elevator solutions. Our brand partnerships ensure that we can offer a wide range of options to meet your specific needs and preferences.
brands.qualityText: All our partner brands meet or exceed industry safety standards and regulations. We only work with manufacturers who demonstrate a commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction.
